description:
e_coli_core
Educational model of of Escherichia coli's central carbon metabolism

Contains:
174 genes + 3 pseudogenes for spontaneous reactions
72 metabolites
95 reactions

Publication:
Orth, J. D., Fleming, R. M., & Palsson, B. Ø. (2010). Reconstruction and Use of Microbial Metabolic Networks: the Core Escherichia coli Metabolic Model as an Educational Guide. EcoSal Plus, 4(1), 10.1128/ecosalplus.10.2.1. https://doi.org/10.1128/ecosalplus.10.2.1
